00011 
00012 //  HP aCC C++ compiler setup:
00013 
00014 #if (__HP_aCC <= 33100)
00015 #    define BOOST_NO_INTEGRAL_INT64_T
00016 #    define BOOST_NO_OPERATORS_IN_NAMESPACE
00017 #  if !defined(_NAMESPACE_STD)
00018 #     define BOOST_NO_STD_LOCALE
00019 #     define BOOST_NO_STRINGSTREAM
00020 #  endif
00021 #endif
00022 
00023 #if (__HP_aCC <= 33300)
00024 // member templates are sufficiently broken that we disable them for now
00025 #    define BOOST_NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATES
00026 #    define BOOST_NO_DEPENDENT_NESTED_DERIVATIONS
00027 #    define BOOST_NO_USING_DECLARATION_OVERLOADS_FROM_TYPENAME_BASE
00028 #endif
00029 
00030 #if (__HP_aCC <= 33900) || !defined(BOOST_STRICT_CONFIG)
00031 #    define BOOST_NO_UNREACHABLE_RETURN_DETECTION
00032 #    define BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_TEMPLATES
00033 #    define BOOST_NO_SWPRINTF
00034 #    define BOOST_NO_DEPENDENT_TYPES_IN_TEMPLATE_VALUE_PARAMETERS
00035 //     std lib config should set this one already:
00036 //#    define BOOST_NO_STD_ALLOCATOR
00037 #endif 
00038 
00039 // optional features rather than defects:
00040 #if (__HP_aCC >= 33900)
00041 #    define BOOST_HAS_LONG_LONG
00042 #    define BOOST_HAS_PARTIAL_STD_ALLOCATOR
00043 #endif
00044 
00045 #if (__HP_aCC <= 53800 )
00046 #    define BOOST_NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATE_KEYWORD
00047 #endif
00048 
00049 #define BOOST_COMPILER "HP aCC version " BOOST_STRINGIZE(__HP_aCC)
00050 
00051 //
00052 // versions check:
00053 // we don't support HP aCC prior to version 0:
00054 #if __HP_aCC < 33000
00055 #  error "Compiler not supported or configured - please reconfigure"
00056 #endif
00057 //
00058 // last known and checked version is 0:
00059 #if (__HP_aCC > 53800)
00060 #  if defined(BOOST_ASSERT_CONFIG)
00061 #     error "Unknown compiler version - please run the configure tests and report the results"
00062 #  endif
00063 #endif
